resources.string: Make sure that the printer is on. If a connection cannot be established, please switch the printer off and turn it on again.
Connecting to the printer through Bluetooth
Please turn on the printer and link it to your phone by tapping the button. The PIN of the Bixolon printers is 0000.
Tap the "Print" button to start printing
This is an Open Source project
Tap here and get the code at GitHub
